text: Ariko amezi matagatifu narangira, mujye mwica ababangikanyamana (barenze ku masezerano mwagiranye bakanifatanya n’umwanzi wanyu) aho muzajya mubasanga hose. Muzajye mubacakira, mubagote munabubikire muri buri bwubikiro. Ariko nibicuza (bakareka kubangikanya Imana) bagatuganya iswala, bakanatanga amaturo, muzajye mubareka. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimpuhwe
